title: "My Guilds" List Problem

body:
IDK. Its pretty buggy on desktop. For me, it doesn't show guilds that I joined that have <100 members. 

If its not a bug, there might be some unknown threshold for the amount of guilds you need to join before your "My guilds" tab is purely your actual joined guilds. You might want to either @ one of the devs or bring the issue to the Ruqqus Discord since the devs are pretty active there.
body_html:
IDK. Its pretty buggy on desktop. For me, it doesn't show guilds that I joined that have <100 members.

If its not a bug, there might be some unknown threshold for the amount of guilds you need to join before your "My guilds" tab is purely your actual joined guilds. You might want to either @ one of the devs or bring the issue to the Ruqqus Discord since the devs are pretty active there.

post.title: "My Guilds" List Problem

body:
I'm seeing the same as you.

https://ruqqus.com/mine and https://ruqqus.com/browse?sort=subs

Are identical and in no way are the guilds I've joined.

body: I'm in a shitload of Guilds, so if there's a threshold it must be a sky-high one. Not being a geek, I don't do Discord.

author.bio:
Goodbye. https://ruqqus.com/+The_Cabal/post/d9y9/i-told-you-so-all-the

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.

body:
Looks like a new bug. Could be wrong but I don't remember that happening before. I actually just noticed this a few hours ago too.

Edit: Yep, I found another post about it from recently: https://ruqqus.com/post/3tpj/httpsruqquscommine-just-seems-to-be-showing
